summary: This document is an email chain from August 16, 2019, discussing coordination between U.S. and French authorities regarding the Epstein investigation. A U.S. DOJ attaché in Paris requests a connection to U.S. colleagues working on the Epstein case to share information about Epstein's potential connections to France with the Paris prosecutor's office.

events.title: Inquiry from Paris Prosecutor's Office
events.description: The U.S. DOJ attaché in Paris receives an inquiry from the Paris prosecutor's office about Jeffrey Epstein's potential connections to France.

keyFacts: On August 16, 2019, U.S. and French authorities were coordinating regarding the Epstein investigation.
The Paris prosecutor's office had an active inquiry into Jeffrey Epstein's potential connections to France.
A U.S. DOJ attaché in Paris sought to connect with U.S. colleagues working on the Epstein case to facilitate information sharing with French investigators.
